subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Backup catcher Mike Nickeas’s double led to Jordany Valdespin’s first major league hit, a three-run homer in the ninth that sent the Mets to their third straight win.
snippet: Backup catcher Mike Nickeas’s double led to Jordany Valdespin’s first major league hit, a three-run homer in the ninth that sent the Mets to their third straight win.
